texto: The dispute resolver using a determinative method can be called an adviser, arbitrator, panel, evaluator, neutral or ombudsman. NOTE 3 In some parts of the world, the same dispute resolver can conduct more than one method of dispute resolution in the same dispute, e.g. a facilitator can move from active facilitation to providing advice (at that time b e co m i ng a n advi s er) i f the co mp l a i n a nt h a s no t b e en s ati s fie d i n the fac i l itative p ro ce s s . S i m i l a rl y, a fac i l itato r can render a decision if the facilitative process has not resolved the case.
